text: Mayela nodonga, ibe ileleenkedama ezimbini ezingamakhwenkwe esixekweni, phantsi kwalo bekukho ubutyebi bawo, utata wawo waye elilungisa. Ke kungoko iNkosi yakho Iye Yanenjongo yokuba bafikelele ebudaleni Ize Iburhole ubutyebi babo, bube yinceba evela eNkosini yakho, Ke kaloku mna andenzanga ngokokuthanda kwam. Leyo ke yintsingiselo yoko wena ungakhanga ukwazi ukukunyamezela.‚Äù
